name: Humble Heroine
description:
Quick game to dust off my coding tendons.

  • Z  -  Attack   |   Arrow Keys - Movement
  • X  -  Dodge
  • C  -  Special

____________________________________________________

  • Player sprite: Warrior-Free Animation set V1.3
  • Player sounds: RPG Voice Starter Pack
  • Skeleton sprite: Skeleton Sprite Pack
  • Tileset: Free Dungeon Ruins Tileset
  • Font: Pixel fonts by druid 01
  • Music: Uncharted World by Argsound
  • Other sounds created with www.bfxr.net
